list_definition.definition: a large container for holding water in which to wash the whole body

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ll fill the bath with water for you.

list_definition.definition: an act of washing in a bath

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I had a bath last night.

list_definition.mean_english: bình chứa dung dịch hóa chất
list_definition.definition: a container of liquid etc in which something is immersed
